forum.content:
look out of the window
看著窗外的景色
what's passing you by
這是你期許的嗎

if you really want this
你真的想要看見這些嗎
bad enough
真的糟透了

you're young and good looking
你看來青春洋溢
the keys to the kingdom
但 這是最關鍵的時候

sooner or later
遲早 遲早
and before your very eyes
你將會看見

old soul on young shoulders
看見自己慢慢的變老 變成負擔
how you'll look when you're older
你會看著自己變老 變成負擔嗎
times' fickle card game with you and i
時間的遊戲 每一個人都一樣

you have to take your chances
去找尋那屬於你的存在
the book of forgiveness
這本書也你自己來完成 並且傳承下去

sooner or later
遲早 遲早
and before your very eyes
你會看見的 會看見的

(中文歌詞是本人與這首歌的共鳴)非正確翻譯

urls.description: Buy the new Atoms For Peace album Amok now: http://smarturl.it/A-M-O-K Amok is also available in the
urls.title: Atoms For Peace - Before Your Very Eyes

forum.title: Atoms For Peace - Before your very eyes
